name: Magician Generator
explanation: Subtables have been sorted from common to rare. Subtables present entries known in different types of genres and worlds. The first subtables are compatible with the largest number of worlds, and get more specialized towards the end. Non-generic subtables are not called by default to retain compatibility with most settings. Some subtables intentionally overlap. Author: Esko Vesala. Sources: Wikipedia.

tables.name: mythic
tables.explanation: Imaginary magicians once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: rare mythic
tables.explanation: Rare imaginary magicians once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: rare fantasy
tables.explanation: Rare imaginary magicians for fantasy worlds.

tables.name: futuristic
tables.explanation: Imaginary magicians for science fiction worlds.

tables.name: rare futuristic
tables.explanation: Rare imaginary magicians for science fiction worlds.
